Minimal JS: Data Attribute Pattern

This dashboard uses only 7 lines of JavaScript. All visual changes are handled by CSS based on the data-sidebar attribute.

// The entire JavaScript for sidebar toggle
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').addEventListener('click', () => {
  const body = document.body;
  body.dataset.sidebar = body.dataset.sidebar === 'collapsed'
    ? 'expanded'
    : 'collapsed';
});

CSS handles all the visual changes:

body[data-sidebar="expanded"] {
  --nav-width: 280px;
}

body[data-sidebar="collapsed"] {
  --nav-width: 72px;
}

body[data-sidebar="collapsed"] .nav-label {
  display: none;
}
